section.title: Driver Initialization
section.para: This section explains actions necessary to activate and properly configure specific drivers.

section.title: Qlogic drivers
section.para: Most Qlogic HCAs need specific firmware that is not part of the Linux kernel. Qlustar's image modules already include the firmware images.
